mapper.select: SELECT TRA_ID , TRA_NAME , TRA_EMAIL , TRA_PHONE , TRA_BIRTH , TRA_PROFILE , TRA_AUTH , JSON_QUERY(TRA_LIKE,'$' RETURNING VARCHAR2) , JSON_QUERY(TRA_PREFER,'$' RETURNING VARCHAR2), TRA_REGDATE , TRA_DELFLAG FROM TRAINEE WHERE TRA_ID=#{id} AND TRA_DELFLAG ='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAINEE (TRA_ID, TRA_PW, TRA_NAME, TRA_EMAIL, TRA_PHONE, TRA_BIRTH, TRA_PROFILE, TRA_AUTH, TRA_REGDATE, TRA_DELFLAG, TRA_PREFER) VALUES(#{id},#{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{profile}, 'ROLE_USER', SYSDATE, 'N','{"subject":[],"more_time":null,"less_time":null,"date":null,"recommand":[]}')
mapper.select: SELECT RN, TRA_ID , TRA_NAME , TRA_EMAIL , TRA_PROFILE , TRA_AUTH , TRA_REGDATE , TRA_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TRA_REGDATE DESC) RN, TRA_ID , TRA_NAME , TRA_EMAIL , TRA_PROFILE , TRA_AUTH , TRA_REGDATE , TRA_DELFLAG FROM TRAINEE t WHERE TRA_DELFLAG ='N') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRAINEE s WHERE TRA_DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT INS_ID, INS_NAME, INS_EMAIL, INS_PHONE, INS_BIRTH, INS_PROFILE, INS_AUTH, INS_RATING, INS_CARRER, INS_BANKNUM, INS_BANK, INS_REGDATE, INS_DELFLAG FROM INSTRUCTOR WHERE INS_ID =#{id} AND INS_DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTRUCTOR (INS_ID, INS_PW, INS_NAME, INS_EMAIL, INS_PHONE, INS_BIRTH, INS_PROFILE, INS_AUTH, INS_REGDATE, INS_BANKNUM, INS_BANK, INS_DELFLAG) VALUES(#{id},#{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{profile}, 'ROLE_INSTROCTUR', SYSDATE, #{banknum},#{bank}, 'N')
